indicator_name: 정기적이고 민주적으로 운영되는 도시계획 및 관리에 시민사회가 직접 참여하는 구조를 갖추고 있는 도시의 비율
target_name: 2030년까지 포괄적이고 지속가능한 도시화와, 참여, 통합 및 지속가능한 거주지 계획 및 관리 역량 강화

en.title: Proportion of cities with a direct participation structure of civil society in urban planning and management that operate regularly and democratically
en.indicator_name: Proportion of cities with a direct participation structure of civil society in urban planning and management that operate regularly and democratically
en.target: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries
en.un_notes: Fast Track; Reviewed at 5th IAEG-SDG meeting; Request finalized metadata and results of pilot studies
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 2066kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
